mapper.insert: insert into social_security (id, case_apply_id, unit_name, unit_phone1, unit_address, unit_phone2, linkman, phone, last_renew_date, create_time, create_emp_id, status, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseApplyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitPhone1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitPhone2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastRenewDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createEmpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
